conbody.p: The DoD Directive 5500.07, Standards of Conduct, DoD 5500.07-R, Joint Ethics Regulation, DISA Instruction 100-50-06, Standards of Ethical Conduct, and DISA Employeesâ€™ Guide to the Standards of Conduct, provide extensive agency guidance governing this topic.
Contact General Counsel (GC) with any questions.
